TopicTitle: Major Problems with docking ports V1.1.2

Articles.Content:
I am having major problems docking, even with using simple Clamp o Trons, and with Mechjeb autopilot, there is no force of attraction between the two ports. Yes I made sure they are the same model and the right side out... Any help would be great...

Here is a picture during attempted docking...

 

 

And here is a picture of all the mods I am using...

 

Edited June 3, 2016 by skyhawkmlt

I don't think I've seen someone with this problem before. It's ALL docking ports, right? And you're trying to dock like ports together? And you've not got some mod that enforces "male" and "female" ports? I don't know every mod on your list but figure hey, it's worth a shot.

Your best bet is to build a very simple stock craft that will drop one docking port onto another on the launchpad. Test it in a full stock install to make sure it works, and then install half of your mods and try it. If it fails, you know it's one of those mods, so try again with only half of THOSE installed. Repeat until you're down to 1 mod that is causing it, and then report the problem to them.

It's possible that there is a weird interaction between mods, so you may have to get clever in your testing. However I can't tell you the best way to do this as I've never had that happen when doing this bifurcated testing.

It sounds daunting but really it's not. You've got 33 mods so it will only take 5 or 6 splits to find it.
